title: 2 Bed 2 Bath Corner Unit w/ Balcony - In the New One Chicago Building
posting_body: Stunning 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Unit for rent in the new One Chicago Apartment Complex.
The building is brand new and offers first class amenities from top to bottom.
- Corner Unit - Floor to ceiling windows with a private balcony.
- Includes a membership for each tenant to LifeTime Fitness, which is in the building.
This includes a massive pool deck, full gym, classes, sauna, steam room, and more.
- Similar units in this complex are renting for much more.
- Pets are allowed - There is a 3000 sq ft dog park in the building on the 10th floor.
- Utilities are $200 / month, but include high speed internet.
8 month lease w/ option to extend.
